thread.title: Teen accused of threatening to 'shoot up' Taft High in Lincoln City
thread.title_full: Teen accused of threatening to 'shoot up' Taft High in Lincoln City | OregonLive.com

author: Noelle Crombie | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Teen accused of threatening to 'shoot up' Taft High in Lincoln City
text:
A 15-year-old student at Lincoln City's Taft High School faces multiple criminal accusations related to threats he made about the school , police said.
The incident unfolded late Tuesday, when a student and a parent reported possible threats against Taft High School.
Police said during an internet chat that evening a male student "made specific threats of harm toward the student reporting the incident. The male student also threatened to bring a gun and 'shoot up the school.'"
The student who made the alleged threats was identified, interviewed and arrested. He is being detained in a juvenile detention facility in Newport. He faces accusations of second-degree coercion and disorderly conduct.
Police said the investigation into the incident is ongoing.
-- The Oregonian
